Name: VRLab Academy Anatomy VR
About the game: VRLab Academy: Anatomy VR is an interactive anatomy atlas. Walk through the futuristic VRLab. Navigate smoothly and effortlessly, in this beautiful. and modern yet highly optimized Vr experience See the body disappears before your very eyes only to show the inner workings of the human anatomy. You can take any of the human organs, and inspect it with your virtual hands and eyes. Feel the beating heart or the breathing lungs. See the food traveling through the human body. See the: Body systems Include - Muscular System - Skeletal System - Urinary System - Digestive System - Lymphatic system - Cardiovascular System - System ventilators - Nervous System Please note that this is the Demo version with respect to VRLab Academy experiments.
